expPosts.title: Software Engineer
expPosts.desc: Worked on designing and developing backend systems using Java, Spring Boot, and Microservices. Built and integrated REST APIs for digital banking and fintech projects. Modernized legacy systems and delivered secure, scalable solutions for local banks.

expPosts.title: Senior Backend Developer
expPosts.desc: Worked on APIs used to construct for the bank, across the whole product. Work closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, designers, and product managers, to implement and advocate for best practices.

expPosts.title: Developer
expPosts.desc: Developed software solutions diverse array of projects such as Retail, Delivery,Survey and point-of-sale applications. Collaborated with other developers to integrate systems for the clients.
